snippet.title: Chocolate Mint Pie
snippet.description: I got this recipe from a mailing list and it was so good I had to share it! This pie goes over well with company--and kids!

snippet.title: Fruity White Tea Smoothie
snippet.description: I've been playing around with this recipe a lot... and I think I found the best way to do it. It's a great and healthy pick me up.

snippet.title: Fire and Ice Hot Chocolate
snippet.description: My favorite recipe for hot chocolate! Sooo good! The hot chocolate with a scoop of cold ice cream... delicious!
